summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for, the payment of the cost and expense of the condemnation of a strip of land 66 feet wide (Loyal Heights Ry. Co. right of way) through the N.W. Quarter of the N.W. Quarter of Section 2, 25 N., R. 3 E. M. W., for street purposes, as provided for in Ordinance No. 55698, by the issuance and sale of bonds of the district created to pay therefor.
